definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: There is a big skating ground near our school.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近有一个大型溜冰场。

sentences.english: You can rent roller skates at the skating arena .
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰场你能够租到溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: We can either go to the one next to my house or the one in Tien Mou Park.
sentences.chinese: 我们到我家隔壁或天母公园的溜冰场都可以。

sentences.english: Well, there is an ice skating rink which is fun for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那儿有个对每个人来说都其乐无穷的溜冰场。

sentences.english: Every winter outdoor ice skating rinks appear all over Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天，户外溜冰场在北京各处可见。

sentences.english: Visit a skate park together and watch older kids do tricks.
sentences.chinese: 一起参观溜冰场，看年长点的孩子的溜冰技巧。

sentences.english: They turn this entire area in the center here to an ice skating rink.
sentences.chinese: 这里的中心是个溜冰场。

sentences.english: Skating on the skating rink is good fun.
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰场溜冰是很有趣的。

sentences.english: Yesterday afternoon, I went to the ice-skating rink.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午我去溜冰场溜冰。

sentences.english: Only in America......are there handicap parking places in front of a skating rink.
sentences.chinese: 只有在美国，在残疾人停车位前面竟有一个溜冰场。

sentences.english: Now I enjoy going around the rink like a free bird.
sentences.chinese: 如今我喜爱在溜冰场里约束的滑来滑去。

sentences.english: What can you do on the ice rink?
sentences.chinese: 你在溜冰场里能做什么？

definition: skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
